body_html:
If it's IB then we shouldn't have any packet loss.
VLOG(2) is maybe too much verbose, maybe just change all VLOG in rdma.cc to 0, so we can just see the Rendezvous protocol messages.
How many model parameters are there ?

body:
If it's IB then we shouldn't have any packet loss.
VLOG(2) is maybe too much verbose, maybe just change all VLOG in rdma.cc to 0, so we can just see the Rendezvous protocol messages.
How many model parameters are there ?
